statements: DELETE FROM telemetry_data WHERE mission_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND telemetry_type = 'temperature';
DELETE FROM telemetry_data WHERE timestamp < '2023-01-01 12:00:00' AND telemetry_type = 'pressure';
DELETE FROM telemetry_data WHERE mission_id = 101 AND timestamp = '2022-05-15 10:30:00'
DELETE FROM telemetry_data WHERE mission_id = 1 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM mission_status WHERE mission_id = 10 AND status_code = 200;
DELETE FROM telemetry_data WHERE data_type = 'temperature' AND data_value > 100.0;
DELETE FROM telemetry_data WHERE telemetry_id IN (SELECT telemetry_id FROM telemetry_data WHERE mission_id = 'abc-123' ORDER BY telemetry_timestamp DESC)
DELETE FROM spacecraft WHERE spacecraft_name = 'Apollo 11' AND spacecraft_type = 'Lunar Module';
